teaser: McDonald's has released its latest business results, and the numbers are a few Happy Meals short of expectations.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 22, 2013
contentencoded:
McDonald's has released its latest business results, and the numbers are a few Happy Meals short of expectations.

Julia Coronado, chief North America economist for BNP Paribas, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
title: McDonald's earnings: So goes the cheeseburger, so goes the economy?
description: McDonald's has released its latest business results, and the numbers are a few Happy Meals short of expectations.
